name: ScubiBranches
description: A scuba dive log application that allows users to log their dives, view their dive history, and is focused on Nudibranches!
notes: Built with Next.js v14, using Server Actions with a MongoDB database
Next-Auth with Google OAuth for authentication

name: SandraDCM Portfolio
description: A portfolio for my wife, who is a talented 2d lead artist. The website showcases her work and provides a way for potential clients to contact her.
notes: React based website with a custom design and animations
Lots of image hosting and loading through Google Cloud Storage

name: Electron Photo Sorter
description: An electron based application that sorts your photos based on the date they were taken.
notes: Electron based application using native file system API
Pure JS, HTML and CSS only

name: JRC Component Library
description: My own component library built for fun and for testing purposes.
notes: Using React and Storybook to create components and custom styling, available through NPM
Theming is available through CSS variables.
